div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1990 Reggio, S. Caterina, Bruttium, 1913 (856) Burial: mid 3rd cent. B.C. (K) Contents: 179+ AE. In irrigation channel; dispersed but 179 recovered Rhegium (Artemis/lyre; Artemis/Apollo as McClean pl. 60, 23 and 61, 1) Disposition: Reggio Putorti, NSc 1913, pp. 153-4
